oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John T. Wilder corresondence with Martha Wilder, 1862 December 15
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Wilder, John Thomas, 1830-1917
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from J. T. Wilder to his wife Martha scolding her for not writing sooner and apologizing for criticizing her child rearing skills.
